text: Nicolas Priet (born 31 January 1983 in France) is a French retired footballer who now works as Development Manager of Serfim T.I.C in his home country.LinkedIn Profile ==Career== Print started his senior career with Olympique Lyonnais. In 2003, he signed for Leicester City in the English Premier League, where he made one appearance and scored zero goals.Soccerbase Profile After that, he played for English club Doncaster Rovers, French clubs Rouen, AS Saint-Priest, Sète 34, AS Beauvais Oise, AS Béziers, AS Lyon-Duchère and Limonest before retiring. == References == == External links == * Nicolas Priet s'est déja imposé * « LA GAGNE SINON RIEN ! » * Nicolas Priet s'impose comme un cadre * NICOLAS PRIET : PORTER L'AMBITION DE LYON * Entretien avec Nicolas Priet (Lyon-Duchère) * ASBO : nez cassé pour Priet * Lyon-Duchère : Nicolas Priet opérationnel face à l'OL! * Sète : Fin de saison pour Priet * Sète : Priet forfait trois semaines * Foot National Profile * at Footballdatabase.eu * Soccerbase Profile * LFP.fr Profile * at Soccerway Category:Living people Category:1983 births Category:Doncaster Rovers F.C. players Category:Leicester City F.C. players Category:FC Sète 34 players Category:FC Rouen players Category:AS Béziers (2007) players Category:AS Saint-Priest players Category:AS Beauvais Oise players Category:Association football defenders Category:French footballers Category:French expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in England Category:Olympique Lyonnais players
title: Nicolas Priet
